name: Banished
text: Give to the Yondu Udonta player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust your alter-ego → remove Banished from the game. • Discard the Yaka Arrow upgrade and exhaust the Tahlei upgrade. Discard this obligation.

flavor: “The heroes are on the bad side of some nasty intergalactic malcontents who have sent the bounty hunter Sav'rkk after them”
name: Price on Your Head
text: Forced Response: After a friendly character is defeated, heal 1 damage from Sav'rkk. If Sav'rkk is not in play, heal 1 damage from the villain instead.

flavor: “ELive like a dog, die like a dog”
name: Sav'rkk
text: Upgrades cannot be removed from Sav'kk. When Revealed: Summon the Sword-Gun-Arm Attachment and attach it to Sav'rkk.

name: Sword-Gun-Arm
text: Attach to Sav'rkk. If you cannot, attach to the minion withe the highest ATK. If you cannot, this card gain surge. [star] Attached character's attacks gain overkill. Forced Response: When attached character has 2 or less remaining hit points, discard Sword-Gun-Arm.

flavor: “ELet us see what chas hod in store for us this time...” - Sav'rkk
name: Hard to Kill
text: When Revealed: If Sav'rkk is in play, he heals 2 damages. Otherwise, summon Sav'rkk and reveal him. [star] Boost: The vilain heals 2 damages.

name: Savage Destruction
text: When Revealed: If Sav'rkk is in play, he attacks you. Ohterwise, summon Sav'rkk and reveal him.
